description.value:
Average Height : 6'10" - 7'2"

Average Weight : 250 - 300

Ability scores : +2 Dexterity, +2 Strength

Size : Medium

Speed : 6 squares.

Vision : Low-light

Languages : Common, Goblin

Skill Bonuses : +2 Intimidate, +2 Stealth.

 

BUGBEAR FEATURES

Oversized

You can use weapons of your size or one size larger than you as if they were your size.

Predatory Eye

You can use predatory eye as an encounter power.

 

BUGBEAR RACIAL POWER

@Compendium[dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.keQ1Ld9bw0uG47YH]{Predatory Eye}

 

Bugbear Characteristics : This race is currently detailed as a monster. For the full monster write-up, refer to its source.

Bugbear Male Names : Brinjin, Drulyut, Hellyug, Lorzod, Melgar, Memgum, Nattumung, Rugulron, Shriggaloy, Ukret, Wengaloy

Bugbear Female Names : Culgecka, Gultegga, Hane, Hrugga, Sungammem, Vurvon
